newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Presscrete hits high of S$0.37 at debut.
newsitem.headline: Presscrete hits high of S$0.37 at debut.

text.p: Engineering specialist Presscrete Holdings Ltd hit a high of Singapore $0.37 on Monday at its debut against its initial offer price of S$0.30.
At 0122 GMT, the stock was changing hands at S$0.36 after touching a low of S$0.33 earlier. Volume was an active 3.03 million shares.
"There seems to be some interest in this stock. The issue was small and those who did not manage to get the stock at the IPO would be getting it now," said a dealer with a local brokerage.
Presscrete had offered 14 million shares at S$0.30 for listing on the second board, SESDAQ. Of the total, 3.5 million shares were placed out to institutional investors.
The group had forecast a 1996 turnover of S$18.7 million and net profit of S$1.5 million. - Singapore Newsroom 65-8703080
